verses.name: 1 Kings 11:40
verses.text: Solomon sought therefore to kill Jeroboam. And Jeroboam arose, and fled into Egypt, unto Shishak king of Egypt, and was in Egypt until the death of Solomon.

verses.name: 1 Kings 11:41
verses.text: And the rest of the acts of Solomon, and all that he did, and his wisdom, are they not written in the book of the acts of Solomon?

verses.name: 1 Kings 11:42
verses.text: And the time that Solomon reigned in Jerusalem over all Israel was forty years.

verses.name: 1 Kings 11:43
verses.text: And Solomon slept with his fathers, and was buried in the city of David his father: and Rehoboam his son reigned in his stead.
